allLocationsData.name: Power Plant
description: To reach the Power Plant, look for a body of water on the north-east corner of Route 9. Then, surf south.

allLocationsData.name: Power Plant Basement
description: To reach the Power Plant, look for a body of water on the north-east corner of Route 9. Then, surf south.
Zapdos can only be encountered here if your lead Pokemon is alive and holding a Feather of Zapdos or Feather of Zapdos (Enhanced).

allLocationsData.name: Sinnoh Underground Main
description: An underground area located below Sinnoh.
The Sinnoh Underground is split into 5 sections; each one accessed from different locations.
It can only be accessed by talking to the Underground Man, found in the following areas:
Sunnyshore City, south-east area of the city, across the bridge (underground bottom-right)
Fight Area, east of the Pokemon Center (underground top-right)
Full Moon Island, north of the ferry (underground top-left)
Celestic Town, north of the Pokemon Center (underground middle-left, middle-right)
Oreburgh City, south of the Pokemon Center (underground bottom-left)

allLocationsData.name: Full Moon Island Deep Full Moon Island
New Moon Island Deep New Moon Island
Unova Victory Road Cave North East
N Castle Main
description: Requires the Castle Key to enter, which is a reward for catching 500 unique Pokemon.
All Pokemon here have experience and drop rate boosted by 1.5x.
Note: Legendaries here do not require a Legendary Feather to be encountered.

allLocationsData.name: N Castle Basement
description: Requires the Castle Key to enter, which is a reward for catching 500 unique Pokemon.
All Pokemon here have experience and drop rate boosted by 1.5x.
Note: Legendaries here do not require a Legendary Feather to be encountered.

allLocationsData.name: N Castle Secret Tunnel 2
description: Requires the Castle Key to enter, which is a reward for catching 500 unique Pokemon.

allLocationsData.name: Abyssal Ruins
description: Located within N Castle.

allLocationsData.name: Water Temple
description: Located within N Castle. Requires the Castle Key to enter.

allLocationsData.name: Altering Cave
description: A unique area in which the wild Pokemon change daily. An Altering Cave Scroll can reveal the current encounters.
Low chance for a random legendary Pokemon to be encounterable.
$600,000 entry fee. Lasts 24 hours.
Wild Pokemon here have a 1.3x encounter rate boost, increased drop rate for IV Resets but do not drop money.

description: Located within Mt. Coronet.
